overview: Ogroff, an AWOL-solider-turned-hermit, lives in the French backwoods, and, still believing war to be raging, slaughters anyone who enters them. One day, a family's car breaks down in Ogroff's domain and a fight for their lives begins.
tagline: For Ogroff, the mad lumberjack, the war is not over yet...
title: Ogroff
